questions.question: What has transformed the Indians' life?

choices.answer: Elk Dog
the Spaniards
Horse
Moose Dog

questions.question: Long Arrow

choices.answer: Was an orphan everyone loved and helped
Was a hated man who people wished to kill
Was a dog who carried people's bundles
Was abandoned by everyone he knows/loves

questions.question: What came out of Long Arrow's ears?

choices.answer: Worms.
A pop.
Things that looked like worms.

questions.question: Good Running is...

choices.answer: the village chief who hunts cows
A chief who feeds Long Arrow and gives him a job
A chief who adopts Good Arrow
A chief who adopts Long Arrow and helps him

questions.question: How did Long Arrow grow up?

choices.answer: He surpassed the other boys in skills.
He grew up to be his grandfather's biggest joy.
He grew to be very popular in the camp.
He grew up to be hated by Good Running's wife.

questions.question: Choose one of the things that Long Arrow had to do in order to "be a man."

choices.answer: bathe in blood
pray
steam in sweat
make weapons

questions.question: What did Long Arrow set out to find?

choices.answer: The spirits
His adopted sister
The Elk Dog

questions.question: Long Arrow's final destination is Great Mystery Lake.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: When asked to jump into the lake, Long Arrow decides to...

choices.answer: Go in and show off his swimming skills.
Jumps in because he already threw his life away.
not jump in because he knows he'll drown.
He jumps in to find out what happens.

questions.question: In the lake, Long Arrow...

choices.answer: meets a great man and his children.
is judged by the grandfather and his wife for being too skinny.
is fed by the grandfather, and admires the place he's in.
is fed and admired for not being scared to jump in the lake.

questions.question: What does Long Arrow compare riding a horse to?

choices.answer: the day he got his hearing back.
the day he became a man.
the day he saw his sister again.
the day he was adopted.

questions.question: Long Arrow has to catch a glimpse of Good Running's ankles in order to get his gift.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: When Long Arrow caught a glimpse of Good Running's feet,

choices.answer: He saw that they were both Elk Dog feet.
He saw how nasty his feet were.
He saw one Elk Dog foot and one normal foot.
He did not actually get to see his feet at all.

questions.question: How many things did Long Arrow ask for from Good Running?
Which gift does NOT hold magic?

choices.answer: the robe
the Elk Dogs
the buffalo hair rope
the belt

questions.question: What's a kingfisher?

choices.answer: a snake
a fish
a bird
a plant

questions.question: A travois is a cart.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: When Long Arrow arrived at home, the people...

choices.answer: were excited to finally have Elk Dogs.
went to get his grandfather to tell him the good news.
thought he was a monster and went into hiding.
celebrated and wept for joy.

questions.question: Did Long Arrow achieve his goal?

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: The main purpose of the short story is to explain...

choices.answer: how the Indians got horses
the importance of bravery and persistence
how doing something for someone else is not good
how one person can make a change for the worst
